alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Calhoun; Lexington; Richland; SCZ036 (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:32PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun, southern Lexington, east central Aiken, northwestern Orangeburg and south central Richland Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 530 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong outflow boundary from a severe thunderstorm in Orangeburg. Gusty winds will move into Lexington and Richland Co over the next 40 minutes. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, West Columbia, Cayce, Forest Acres, Red Bank, Oak Grove, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Gaston, Arcadia Lakes, Riverbanks Zoo, SC State Farmer`s Market, Columbia Metro Airport, SC State Fair Grounds, West Columbia Riverwalk, Sandy Run, Five Points, Woodfield and Swansea. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 2 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 41 and 57. Interstate 26 between mile markers 110 and 133. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
